info.title: NX-Fetch
info.author: Xc98
info.details: Neofetch for the nintendo switch. Prints system info and switch icon ascii art in the style you would see in neofetch.\nPress DPad left / right to change joycon ascii colors

changelog:
If user hasnt been preselected, it will display the first user. The displayed user can be changed by pressing L / R
print resolution in docked mode and display hz
print SD and NAND disk procentage usage
print all connected controllers (P1 to P8 connected via bluetooth and connected in handheld)
update the printed info category text ("BL", "CFW" etc) accent color if joycon ascii colors are changed
